article_text:
01:20 Cellist Amit Peled critiques New World School of the Arts students Pause

03:43 PAMM announces gift of 100 artworks by developer Craig Robins

02:08 Miami Dolphins Hall of Famer Larry Little receives big honor

01:28 Florida Highway Patrol fatal shooting in Miami Gardens

02:27 Obama's visit to Hiroshima, contextualized via the Truman Library

00:31 You will flip when you see this water bottle trick

00:34 Video captures underground transformer explosion

02:03 6-month-old girl becomes youngest water skier in the world

03:32 Young dancer and cancer survivor with a backward leg, inspires millions

01:02 The South Florida Committee celebrates being awarded Super Bowl 54

article_metadata.news-keywords: Affordable Arts, South Florida Theatre League, Summer Theatre Fest, Andie Arthur, Lost Girls Theatre
article_metadata.description: Affordable Arts is a weekly feature aimed at helping arts and culture lovers save money on tickets and admissions. A different discount will be featured each Sunday. Have a suggestion? Email Christine Dolen at cdolen@MiamiHerald.com.
article_metadata.title: Experience new plays for free during Summer Theatre Fest | Miami Herald
